/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. Cars of various colors are scattered along the road, indicating a busy time of day. In the distance, a highway overpass stretches across the frame, a testament to the city's infrastructure. The image is taken from a low angle, looking up at the overpass, which adds a sense of grandeur to the scene.
